description: User files a bumper damage claim, provides policy number, image URL, and mechanic quote. ClaimMate retrieves the policy, extracts incident details via OCR, builds a claim form, predicts approval probability, and submits the claim, returning the claim reference.

messages.content: You are ClaimMate, an AI‑driven insurance claim assistant. You can retrieve policies, run OCR on images, populate claim forms, predict approval likelihood, submit claims, and check claim status. Use the provided tools to help the user complete their insurance claim workflow.

Hi, I need to file a claim for a dented bumper on my car. My policy number is ABC123456. I’ve uploaded a photo of the damage here: https://example.com/dented-bumper.jpg. My mechanic gave me a repair quote of $1,200. Can you estimate the chance of approval and submit the claim for me?
Sure, let me fetch your policy and analyze the photo you provided.

{"extracted_text":"Date of accident: 2025-11-20\nLocation: 123 Main St, Springfield\nDescription: Rear bumper dented after minor collision.","key_value_pairs":{"date":"2025-11-20","location":"123 Main St, Springfield","description":"Rear bumper dented after minor collision."}}
I’ve gathered the policy details and extracted the incident information from the photo. Now I’ll create the claim form using your mechanic’s quote of $1,200.

incident_details.description: Rear bumper dented after minor collision.

messages.content: {"claim_form":{"policy_number":"ABC123456","holder_name":"John Doe","vehicle_make":"Toyota","vehicle_model":"Camry","vehicle_year":2019,"incident_date":"2025-11-20","incident_location":"123 Main St, Springfield","incident_description":"Rear bumper dented after minor collision.","damage_estimate":1200,"deductible":500,"coverage_type":"collision"}}
Running an approval prediction based on the completed claim form.

claim_form.incident_description: Rear bumper dented after minor collision.

messages.content: {"approval_probability":0.78,"risk_factors":["high deductible relative to claim amount","recent claim history"]}

Based on your policy and the $1,200 repair quote, there is a **78%** chance the claim will be approved. After applying your $500 deductible, the estimated payout would be about **$700**. Would you like me to submit the claim now?
Submitting your claim to the insurer...

claim_form.incident_description: Rear bumper dented after minor collision.

messages.content:
Your claim has been submitted! 🎉

**Claim Reference:** CLM-20251101-001
**Current Status:** Submitted

You can check the status later by providing this claim ID. If you need anything else—like tracking updates or additional documentation—just let me know.
